title: [Bug] Attachments in Comments, perma-update
body: Hey, so I've had an update for the same comment for about 2 days now and it refuses to get off my updates page. This is the first comment I've had with an attachment in it so I'm 99% sure that's where the problem is. Not huge, but would very nice to have fixed. :)

replies.body: Hi, thanks for reporting this. We will look into it!
Hey, can confirm problem is now fixed. :)
